thread.title: George Baty
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by George Baty

author: George Baty
title: George Baty
text:
We were pleased to find that the "puffer extender" we would have paid over $40 for at the pharmacy was just over $10 from Express Medical.
I would have given a five star rating but for the fact that the shipping for such a small item came to $8 plus for a total of just over $20. Though half of the pharmacy price still more than necessary as S & H couldn't have been anywhere near $8. A trifling matter, true, but also a matter of principle.
Not displeased.
